name: Christina Levitan
text: I had to wait for the workers to finish having their conversation before they served me. Fine. I get 2 slices of pizza. I order it for here. Every Sbarro I have ever been to, puts the pizza back in to be reheated. Apparently they don't? So, …More

name: Paul Rousselle
text: Just like all other Sbarro,s I've been to, just terrible.The food is aweful and the service is just as bad if not worse. Why anyone would go here twice would be a scratching my head moment.

name: Nolan Banfitch
text: You're better off eating wet cardboard than paying for this sad excuse for pizza.

name: Jean McCarthy
text: I stop at this rest stop frequently and the food is cold or they don’t have  pizza or other entrees and staff is VERY unfriendly and unwilling to respond

name: Chelsea Johnson
text: I've been to several Sbarro and have never had an issue. However, this location, was an awful experience. They were 'out' of almost everything I tried to order (pepperoni stromboli, pepperoni pizza, Alfredo). Finally got a slice of cheese …More

name: Rishoo Singh
text: It’s pathetic. They looked least interested to help. The old lady on the reception was rude.

name: mike matevich
text: Whoever is managing this place needs to go. I stop my truck, walk the half mile to enter the place and at 230 in the afternoon they are out of pizza. Never stop here again, never.

name: Matthew E Perkins
text: This place was awful. Stopped in on my way home around 12:30 and yes it was busy, but the woman working was an absolute (rhymes with punt). Pizza was undercooked you could see through it, the employees were rude as Far.

name: Mexi l Booboo
text: Why is this place stil in business?  Terrible in every way you can imagine.
